text: Hot Press is a music and political magazine. It was founded in 1977. The magazine is based in Dublin, Republic of Ireland. It is different from other similar magazines by its anti-establishment opinion and the amount of focus on Irish music, most notably early U2. It is currently edited by Niall Stokes. == Other websites == * Hot Press home page Category:Music magazines Category:Politics of Ireland Category:Republic of Ireland
title: Hot Press
